basic.description: A survey of vernacular literature composed in the British Isles before 1500. Readings may be taken from Welsh, Irish, Old English, Norman and Middle English literature and may include such works as The Mabinogion, the Lais of Marie de France, Beowulf, Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, and selections from Chaucer.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Medieval Literature of the British Isles

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    [(ENGL200 and ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.40 on all ENGL units)] or [(a cumulative GPA of 2.60) and (registration in a MDVL  Plan)].
